name: Mirage: A Biplane Adventure
description:
Welcome to Mirage, a world on the brink of chaos. Enter the cockpit of the world's first biological and mechanical drone, an engineering marvel designed for both exploration and combat. As you soar through the skies of Mirage, you'll embark on a thrilling adventure filled with fast-paced flying, intense aerial combat, and daring exploration.

But your journey begins amidst turmoil. Strange machines are invading Mirage, threatening its very existence. As the brains on the revolutionary biotech drone, you must take to the skies to uncover the origins of these mechanical invaders and thwart their sinister plans. Your skills will be put to the test as you engage in adrenaline-fueled dogfights, navigate treacherous terrain, and unravel the mysteries of this vibrant, yet endangered world.

Features

  • open world
  • exciting speed and aerial combat
  • Unreal Engine graphics
  • no intro screens, no 10 minutes of splash screens before the game starts
  • mouse+keyboard supported. Xbox controller supported for gameplay

Keyboard "P" or Gamepad "back" adds player 2 to the game.
2 controllers required for co-op gameplay.
